analyzers Subpackage

class update_sensei.analyzers.base_analyzer.AnalyzerFactory

Bases: object

static get_analyzer(library, from_version, to_version)

Factory method to get the appropriate analyzer based on the library.

Parameters:

  • library (str) – Name of the library (e.g. ‘numpy’, ‘pandas’)

  • from_version (str) – Starting version of the library

  • to_version (str) – Target version of the library

Return type:

BaseAnalyzer

Returns:

An instance of the appropriate analyzer

Add a deprecation finding to the list.
